info.name: Workplace SCIM Collection
info.description:
A collection of all of the Workplace SCIM API calls.  
For documentation, see https://developers.facebook.com/docs/workplace/account-management/api

request.description: To get list of supported operations on your instance via SCIM API.
To get list of all the peoplesets on your instance.
To get details of a given peopleset based on ID.

To create peopleset using SCIM API. 
Body:
displayName - required.
value       - required

To update peopleset based on ID.
displayName   -required. 
members       -required. must contain type,value pair for **all** members who are needed in set.
  members.type  -required, must be set to "user".
  members.value -required, Workplace ID of the user.
To delete peopleset based on ID.

item.name: Users

request.description:
Get list of all the users on Instance.
startIndex can be incremented to get detials incase there are more than 10 people on the instance.

variable.description: Workplace profile ID of the person

request.description: Get a user based on their Workplace profile ID.

Get User details by filtering via email. 
Workplace SCIM API only supports eq operator at the moment.

query.description: externalId as obtained in Get Request. Often its same as EmployeeID seen on Workplace.

request.description:
Get User details by filtering via external_id. 
Workplace SCIM API only supports eq operator at the moment.

variable.description: Workplace User ID shown under id field in GetUser request.

request.description:
To deactive a user given their ID.
Refer to body for changing status.
active   -can be toggled between true and false.

To create a user.
userName   -required, email ID of the user, the email Id should be from a verified domain, mandatory unless using externalID for a emailless user.
name       -required.

To create an emailless user.
Update body as needed.
externalId   -required, unique ID for the user, mandatory unless using userName for a user with email.
name         -required.

variable.description: Workplace User ID shown under id field in GetUser request.

request.description:
To update user details given their id.
add/remove fields from the body as needed.
Ensure userName Field has been appropriately updated via env variables or removed before running this call.

variable.description: Workplace User ID shown under id field in GetUser request.

request.description:
To delete a user given their ID.
Only works for people who have not claimed their accounts yet. If the account has ever been claimed, you will receive a 412 - Precondition Failed response

item.description: There's various ways to get users in Workplace. Here's a few examples.
